Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there were no confirmed COVID-19 patients hospitalized in Negombo at the time.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the number of COVID-19 patients hospitalized in Negombo.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or confirmation of any COVID-19 patients being hospitalized in Negombo.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that there are COVID-19 patients hospitalized in Negombo based on a misleading Facebook post.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the Facebook post was misleading and there were no actual COVID-19 patients hospitalized in Negombo.
